game.name: 5 Golden Skulls
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Can you escape the cursed temple of Quetzalcoatl? In solo or coop, look out for any anomalies. Observe carefully, as any mistake would be fatal!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Can you escape the cursed temple of Quetzalcoatl? In solo or coop, look out for any anomalies. Observe carefully, as any mistake would be fatal!
